arc_strike.name: Arc Strike
arc_strike.description: Fires an electric arc that deals damage

storm_passive.name: Storm Protocol
storm_passive.description: Attacks chain to 2 additional targets (70% DMG per jump)

chain_lightning.name: Chain Lightning
chain_lightning.description: A stronger attack with a lightning chain

storm_lord.name: Lord of Thunder
storm_lord.description: Chain: +1 target (3 total), 80% DMG per jump instead of 70%

missile_barrage.name: Missile Barrage
missile_barrage.description: Multiple guided missiles in an area

orbital_strike.name: Orbital Strike
orbital_strike.description: ULTIMATE: A massive energy beam from orbit

void_absorption.name: Void Absorption
void_absorption.description: Damage increases as HP is lost

dimensional_rift.name: Dimensional Rift
dimensional_rift.description: Opens a rift that pulls in enemies

dimensional_collapse.name: Dimensional Collapse
dimensional_collapse.description: ULTIMATE: Creates a black hole that destroys everything

barrier_pulse.name: Barrier Pulse
barrier_pulse.description: Fires a force field that bounces off enemies

command_aura.name: Command Aura
command_aura.description: +10% damage for allies, taunts enemies within range 4

veteran.name: Veteran
veteran.description: +25% damage reduction, +20% armor for allies, 5% fortress damage absorbed

cryo_shot.name: Cryo Shot
cryo_shot.description: Cryogenic projectile that slows the target

shatter_shot.name: Shatter Shot
shatter_shot.description: Deals double damage to frozen targets

blizzard_barrage.name: Blizzard Barrage
blizzard_barrage.description: ULTIMATE: A rain of icy shots on all enemies

plasma_lance.name: Plasma Lance
plasma_lance.description: Piercing plasma attack hitting multiple targets

plasma_overload.name: Plasma Overload
plasma_overload.description: Massive plasma explosion with high crit

ghost_protocol.name: Ghost Protocol
ghost_protocol.description: ULTIMATE: Becomes invisible; next attack deals 300% DMG

execute_strike.name: Execution
execute_strike.description: Deals 80 DMG + 100% bonus vs targets <30% HP

lethal_precision.name: Lethal Precision
lethal_precision.description: +25% crit damage, critical hits heal 10 HP

void_slash.name: Void Slash
void_slash.description: Cuts through enemies, damaging all along the path

death_mark.name: Death Mark
death_mark.description: Marks a target - it takes +50% DMG for 5s

omega_protocol.name: Omega Protocol
omega_protocol.description: ULTIMATE: Instantly eliminate targets <25% HP, otherwise 400 DMG

plasma_explosion.name: Plasma Explosion
plasma_explosion.description: Area explosion that burns all enemies

pillar_of_fire.name: Pillar of Fire
pillar_of_fire.description: Creates a pillar of fire that deals continuous damage

thermal_apocalypse.name: Thermal Apocalypse
thermal_apocalypse.description: ULTIMATE: 200 DMG + 50% enemy HP (max 500+10/lv) to all

heart_of_winter.name: Heart of Winter
heart_of_winter.description: +30% max HP, regenerates when not under attack

eternal_winter.name: Eternal Winter
eternal_winter.description: A zone of eternal gloom that freezes enemies

absolute_zero.name: Absolute Zero
absolute_zero.description: ULTIMATE: Freezes all enemies and strengthens defense
